
    dependent_one = TheoryDependent.new(StringToTheory.run("if(var1.length == var2.length)\nend"))
    action_one = TheoryAction.new(
    	TheoryStatement.new(
    		StringToTheory.run('Statement.new(Return.new,var3)')
			),
			StringToTheory.run('var4.statement_id')
		)
    result_one = TheoryResult.new(
    	StringToTheory.run("if(var4.all_pass?(var5))\nreturn true\nend")
		)      
    Theory.new([dependent_one],action_one,[result_one])
